name: Davey Bones' Spooky Jaunt
description:
Update 1.2

  • Camera's been zoomed out a bit.
  • Updated How To Play level and a few other things to make things a bit clearer.

Update 1.1

  • Added score ranks for completing levels, just so you can see how bad you did!
  • Added a new 'How to Play' level to help players get used to the controls.
  • Added a mute button on the titlescreen.

Davey Bones is in a hurry to get to the Halloween Hop! Let's hope no baddies, spikes or traps get in his way as he runs, jumps n' dashes his way to the party!

CONTROLS!

PAD
dpad - move
A - jump
X dash

KEYBOARD WASD
A/D - move
L jump
K dash

KEYBOARD ARROWS
arrows - move
X - jump
Z - dash
